entry.title: Leroi Conroy: ‘Panthera Cry’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Leroi Conroy: ‘Panthera Cry’

 Best New Music

Leroi Conroy is the alter-ego of Colemine Records’ owner, recording artist, and sound designer Terry Cole.

Jul. 18

entry.title: Marissa Nadler: ‘New Radiations’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Marissa Nadler: ‘New Radiations’

 Best New Music

Consummate collaborator Marissa Nadler (Father John Misty, John Cale, Angel Olsen, etc.) will release her tenth studio album New Radiations on Aug. 15 via Sacred Bones Records.

Jul. 17

entry.title: 54 Ultra: ‘No Tengo Valor’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
54 Ultra: ‘No Tengo Valor’

 Best New Music

New Jersey-based synth-rock-soul purveyor 54 Ultra slays us with First Work, a six-track EP that contains the Spanglish single “No Tengo Valor.”

Jul. 16

entry.title: Other Lives: ‘Mystic’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Other Lives: ‘Mystic’

 Best New Music

“Mystic” offers a cinematic sneak peak into Other Lives ’ forthcoming album Volume V (due Oct. 10 via Play It Again Sam).

Jul. 15

entry.title: Juan Wauters: ‘Manejando Por Pando’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Juan Wauters: ‘Manejando Por Pando’

 Best New Music

Queens-based artist Juan Wauters ’ new LP MVD LUV celebrates his hometown of Montevideo, Uruguay.

Jul. 14

entry.title: Wet Leg: ‘catch these fists’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Wet Leg: ‘catch these fists’

 Best New Music

If you’re looking for a fight, you found it.

Jul. 11

entry.title: Ty Segall: 'Possession’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Ty Segall: 'Possession’

 Best New Music

Ty Segall’s sixteenth(!) album Possession finds the LA-based artist highlighting American stories, and letting his guitar and voice lead the way.

Jul. 10

entry.title: Francis Bebey: ‘Le Grand Soleil De Dieu (Psychemagik Remix)’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Francis Bebey: ‘Le Grand Soleil De Dieu (Psychemagik Remix)’

 Best New Music

Sometimes a song deserves a simple, straightforward superlative: “gorgeous.” “Le Grand Soleil De Dieu (Psychemagik Remix),” is one of those songs.

Jul. 9
